long_description: Now get all-purpose, biodegradable Campsuds soap in a leak-proof, re-usable Nalgene(R) bottle. Just a few drops provide quick, effective suds for camp cleaning chores in hot or cold water--even salt water! Durable 4-oz. Nalgene bottle comes with a leak-proof cap. Contains purified water, vegetable-based biodegradable anionic and non-ionic cleaning agents, natural fragrance, oils and germaben.
short_description: Now get all-purpose, biodegradable Campsuds soap in a leak-proof, re-usable Nalgene(R) bottle.
